snippet: The peer-to-peer start-up Lending Club has secured a $15 million investment from Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers. And Mary Meeker, a former top Internet analyst at Morgan Stanley and now a partner at Kleiner Perkins, will join the board.
abstract: The peer-to-peer start-up Lending Club has secured a $15 million investment from Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers. And Mary Meeker, a former top Internet analyst at Morgan Stanley and now a partner at Kleiner Perkins, will join the board.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Lending Club Reaps $15 Million From Kleiner Perkins
